text.section: The requirements of KRS 12.450 to 12.465 shall affect all boards, committees, commissions, task forces, or ad hoc committees created on or after June 21, 2001.
For boards, committees, commissions, task forces, or ad hoc committees in existence prior to June 21, 2001, any vacancy arising on or after June 21, 2001, shall be filled pursuant to KRS 12.460.

law.history: Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 14, effective June 21, 2001. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 336, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1996.
